name: Jrimp Gaiden (A Fan Project)
description:
Friiick

"What do you get when you cross an owl with a bungee cord? My ass..." - Master Betty

In the wake of Comic Book heroes showing up on the big screen, it is time for the one true hero to make his mark. Jrimp, a struggler against the tides of fate, battles through time in this incredible tale of loss, sorrow, camaraderie, and romance .   

________________________________________________________________________________________

Thanks to Joe Buchholz (aka Joey Fatoney aka Lenny Logoff) for creating a universe where asses can get loud. But most importantly, where asses can get proud.,..

Thanks to Charles Winsmore (M. D.) for bringing the series into light. 

Forgive me for any inconsistencies with the Kabukicho section. My only frame of reference for Japanese culture is 100+ hours of watching American Ninja Warrior.

p.s. this is FAN project!!! Not OFFICIAL Jrimp!!!!! FAN ONLY!!!!! PLEASE DO NOT SEND MONEY THAT IS LESS THAN $1!!!!
